title: athishaya vara
sahitya:
atishaya vara prasAdini ambA akhilANDa janani ambA



anupallavi



 matimukha sundari mahitE manOhari mAnitE mAyE mAdhavi shankari



caraNam

 yadukula candra shrIkaNThIrava nrsimha bhUvara suta jaya shIlara

mrdu vacana shrI jaya cAmarAjEndrara madahara harikEsha mAnini poreyaLa
